articles.author: Sakshi Tiwari
articles.title: Houthis Make ‘Double Strike’ On US & UK! MQ-9 Reaper Drone Shot Down, British Vessel Sinks In The Red Sea? - EurAsian Times
articles.description: Amid a surge in hostilities in the volatile Red Sea, the Yemen-based Houthi militia that the US and UK have been aggressively fighting may have scored points against both its adversaries. A US MQ-9 drone was shot down by Yemen’s Ansar Allah (Houthi) movement’…
articles.content:
Amid a surge in hostilities in the volatile Red Sea, the Yemen-based Houthi militia that the US and UK have been aggressively fighting may have scored points against both its adversaries.
